mapper.select: SELECT c.TABLE_NAME,c.COLUMN_NAME, c.DATA_TYPE, c.IS_NULLABLE, c.COLUMN_DEFAULT,c.column_key,c.column_comment ,kc.CONSTRAINT_NAME, kc.REFERENCED_TABLE_NAME,kc.REFERENCED_COLUMN_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS c left outer join INFORMATION_SCHEMA.KEY_COLUMN_USAGE kc on kc.TABLE_NAME = c.table_name and kc.column_name = c.COLUMN_NAMe and kc.TABLE_SCHEMA = c.table_schema WHERE c.table_schema = 'momdeal' and c.table_name =#{tableName};
SELECT c.TABLE_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.tables c WHERE c.table_schema = 'momdeal'

SELECT c.TABLE_NAME,c.COLUMN_NAME, c.DATA_TYPE, c.IS_NULLABLE, c.COLUMN_DEFAULT,c.column_key,c.column_comment FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS c WHERE c.table_schema = 'momdeal' and c.table_name =#{tableName};

SELECT c.TABLE_NAME,c.COLUMN_NAME, c.DATA_TYPE, c.IS_NULLABLE, c.COLUMN_DEFAULT,c.column_key,c.column_comment FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS c WHERE c.table_schema = 'momdeal' and c.table_name =#{tableName} and c.column_name = #{columnName}

SELECT TABLE_NAME,COLUMN_NAME,CONSTRAINT_NAME, REFERENCED_TABLE_NAME,REFERENCED_COLUMN_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.KEY_COLUMN_USAGE WHERE REFERENCED_TABLE_SCHEMA = 'momdeal' AND REFERENCED_TABLE_NAME = #{tableName}
SELECT table_comment FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA='momdeal' AND TABLE_NAME=#{tableName}
